title: Blocking of strange site in Firefox by Malwarebytes
content:
Malwarebytes www.malwarebytes.com

-Log Details- Protection Event Date: 12/05/2024 Protection Event Time: 10:52 Log File: 0728216c-103d-11ef-bf81-74e6e24e33e7.json

-Website Data- Category: RiskWare Domain: zeewhaih.com IP Address: 139.45.197.245 Port: 80 Type: Outbound File: C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe


(end)

Should I be worried about this?

Thank you Dave
creator: davepp

title: Impossibile esportare password in Kaspersky Password
content: come utente Kaspersky utilizzo anche Kaspersky Password, fino ad ora non ho avuto problemi a importarvi le password che Firefox memorizza, ma da questa mattina mi dice che è impossibile importare. Ho provato da Edge e funziona ( ma generalmente non lo utilizzo non è il mio predefinito ) e quindi ora ho tutte le password vecchie .... ( ho di recente cambiato email e diverse passowrd sono state modificate ). Cosa può essere successo visto che ha sempre funzionato e che con edge comunque va presumo sia cambiato qualcosa in Firefox.
creator: deantoni.lusvardi

title: Bookmarks Rearranging themselves
content: So on my Legion laptop, Windows 11 Home, the bookmarks keep rearranging themselves, iv also noticed A LOT of duplicates and folders which I did not add. I rebooted the laptop then tried scanning the it with WindowsDefender and Malwarebytes, and refreshing the application. On my desktop which is synced, there is no issue. I thought I was seeing things at first until I focused right on the bookmark tool bar and every 10-20 seconds one will just pop into a new position. Will a fresh install work? That's my next step, but wanted to see if there is a better solution.
creator: verc3tti

title: Windows 11 'OS level' VPN settings?
content:
Hello, 

  First post and could not find this surprisingly... I'm wondering what settings to use for windows 11 VPN section. i installed on my desktop but when i go to VPN settings in current win 11 it does not list a VPN. is this possible to use Mozilla VPN at OS level or is it only via ff browser?  Thanks!

I love Mozilla and what they do with their products! :-)

content: My computer updated with no warning one night, and i lost all personalization and even everything stored in my firefox, the sign ins, passwords, bookmarks, all. is there a way for me to find all that was erased?

title: Watching a series of tutorials from the Phlearn site. Does not auto advance to next video. Usually recommences the just watched video. Do not have this problem on other browsers
content: There seems to be something specific to the Phlearn site and Firefox which prevents videos from auto advancing. They either recommence the just completed video or revert to an earlier one.
creator: jpettett

title: Firefox deleting pdfs downloaded in private mode
content: I had downloaded a couple of pdfs from google drive via private browsing which were stored in my 'Downloads' folder. But as soon as I closed the window the pdfs were deleted. I had also downloaded a zip file which wasn't deleted.

title: Youtube crashes in latest version for Mac
content: Just a short time ago Version 125.0.3 downloaded. Since then I cannot open Youtube without it crashing. When I ask it to restore the tab (one of 2 choices offered, it crashes again. After 4 or 5 times I close the tab and switch to another browser. I shut off the one extension I had running. That fixed nothing. I looks like my 2019 iMac is too old and I need to go back to an earlier version.
creator: jimroymasterofdisaster

title: DNS Over HTTPS - NS_ERROR_CONNECTION_REFUSED
content:
Hi there!

I'm trying to troubleshoot why firefox isn't connecting to my DNS over HTTPS instance running adguard home. Every other device (including another laptop) is able to set the DNS over HTTPS and connect successfully - but my desktop PC instance gets NS_ERROR_CONNECTION_REFUSED. Despite multiple reboots, ipconfig /flushdns, release/renew, etc...

Even my android phone is able to connect to it using the "private dns" feature (uses port 853 instead of 443).

I've been able to verify https access to the DNS server and it's querying successfully. It's just this one instance it won't connect.
creator: josh.a.menzel
